pathAssistantSteps.info:
Stage Overview

Crossing the Finish Line

  • Quotes have been generated (if applicable)
  • Negotiations are nearly complete
  • Business and DoorDash are ready to create a contract
  • Redlines to the contract are still occurring
  • Deal has not yet been won

Stage Overview

Determining the Best Products and Rates

  • Business has shown interest in any or all products pitched
  • Actively negotiating which products and rates will be sold to the business
  • Specific individuals pertaining to deal and their role have been identified


Required Actions: Add at least 1 Quote to the Opportunity and have it tagged as “Primary”. (N/A for Franchise Accounts)

Stage Overview

﻿Initial Conversations

  • Successfully made contact with business
  • Pitch meeting scheduled
  • Yet to begin quoting of rates /terms
  • For SMB:
    • Discovery: Initial Call with Mx scheduled.
    • Demo: Call with Mx scheduled for pitch.
    • Business Considerations: Follow-up meetings are needed to understand business needs.

Required Actions:

  • 1 Primary Contact and 1 Contact Role of Contract Signatory must be associated with this opportunity. You may have 2 separate contacts (1 Primary Contact and 1 Contract Signatory) or a single contact serving as both (Primary Contact having a role of Contract Signatory)
  • Add 1+ Opportunity Brand Relationship to Opportunity
  • For SMB Opportunities with a SDR & Type = New, add at least 1 Event Activity with Status "Event Held" to Opportunity

Stage Overview

﻿Pre-Pipeline Idea

  • For tracking potential deals that aren’t ready to be committed to pipeline
  • Can be for a net new or existing business
  • Will not show on forecast reports
  • Untouched: No work has begun on the opportunity.
  • Trying to Reach: Currently working to identify the Decision Maker. Opportunity is not ready to be committed to pipeline.
  • DM Identified: DM has been identified. Currently working on scheduling meeting with DM. Opportunity is not ready to be committed to pipeline.

Stage Overview

Sales Cycle Temporarily Suspended

  • SMB Opportunity will not close in the next 14 days
  • ENT Opportunity will not close in the next 90 days


Required Fields: Close Date, Lost / Stalled Reason Additional Notes
